info.name: KPIs - Index API-Manager Organizations (Sub-Flow)
info.description: Is indexing all organizations of a single API-Manager

parameters.name: apiManager
parameters.metaDescription: The connection details object to use

parameters.name: items
parameters.metaDescription: An array of input items where each item will be passed as request data when invoking the flow.

parameters.name: id
parameters.metaDescription: The ID of a previously configured `Flow Listener`.

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument of the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.

parameters.name: code
parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises. `data` is the value of the Data parameter. `logger` is the API Builder logger. See the docs for more info: https://docs.axway.com/bundle/API_Builder_4x_allOS_en/page/javascript_flow-node.html
